metadata.title: CVE-2023-0341 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A stack buffer overflow exists in the ec_glob function ofeditorconfig-core-c before v0.12.6 which allowed an attacker to arbitrarilywrite to the stack and possibly allows remote code execution.editorconfig-core-c v0.12.6 resolved this vulnerability by bound checkingall write operations over the p_pcre buffer.

criterions.comment: editorconfig-core: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
